Forever in Our Hearts Small Funeral Prayer Card

Best Price! Forever in Our Hearts Small Funeral Prayer Card – Sympathy Cards Forever in Our Hearts Small Funeral Prayer Card quality over price Forever in Our Hearts Small Funeral Prayer Card quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same categoryForever in Our Hearts Funeral Small Prayer Card featuring 3 of your favorite photos, words, and Psalm. Easy to personalize if you would prefer other text. Perfect to slip into notes, Bibles, or to give to those who could not attend the memorial service. Makes a wonderful keepsake. This is the small "pocket sized" version. **Other sizes available; please see the full collection**
